label: 大学
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the royal university first instituted during the era of Great King Tenji (668-71) to train royal officials. Later, a chapter of the ritsuryô codes was devoted to its organization and operation by the Bureau of the Royal University, the Daigakuryô 大学寮. [律令]
